page.title: 12The Spar Grocery Shop.
page.content: We went to the Spar in Sutton which is a food shop.It is owned by{Mr and Mrs {Blackburn. Mrs Blackburn.}She likes her job very much. She has not lived here all her life but only for 6 years. She used to live in Leeds.The most common food she sells is baked beans and sweets.The favourite part of Mrs Blackburn's job is meeting people. The most boring part of{Mrs {Blackburn's}job is when it is not busy. Mrs Blackburns shop has 300 customers in the winter and 700 in summer.She has 4 part time workers. {Mrs Blackburn}used to work as a part time secretary.Her hobbies are reading and amateur dramatics.{Mr Blackburns hobbies are golf,computers and bridge.
